TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UsingTask extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a single [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](../../add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
Gets the `AssemblyFile` attribute value of the [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `AssemblyFile` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.
Docs.returns: The `AssemblyFile` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.

Docs.summary: Gets the `AssemblyName` attribute value of the [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `AssemblyName` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.
Docs.returns: The `AssemblyName` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.

Docs.summary: Gets the `Condition` attribute value of the [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `Condition` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.
Docs.returns: The `Condition` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element was imported into the project.
Docs.value: if the `UsingTask` element was imported into the project; otherwise, .
Docs.returns: if the `UsingTask` element was imported into the project; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the `TaskName` attribute value of the [UsingTask](../Topic/UsingTask%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `TaskName` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.
Docs.returns: The `TaskName` attribute value of the `UsingTask` element.
